description:
Located in Lee's Summit, Missouri, the law office of Woods Law KC provides unmatched advocacy and support to clients throughout the greater Kansas City metro region and surrounding areas who suffered an injury or lost a loved one due to someone else's negligence or wrongdoing. Led by highly experienced trial lawyer Aaron Woods, the law firm has become the trusted source for compassionate yet aggressive advocacy to individuals and families adversely affected by motor vehicle accidents, slip-and-fall accidents, medical malpractice, defective products and other preventable tragedies.

Possessing more than 30 years of experience, Mr. Woods has the extensive skills and resources required to handle your matter efficiently. He promises to do all he can to improve the likelihood you will obtain the maximum amount of compensation you deserve. To date, he has recovered millions of dollars in settlements and verdicts for his plaintiff clients, and his law firm has enjoyed numerous testimonials from those it has served.

No matter the cause of your suffering, you can rely on Mr. Woods and his team of compassionate legal professionals to treat you with the same care and respect they would a member of their own as they fight hard to help you get justice in the wake of an avoidable accident.

To begin the process of securing the help and support you need during this challenging time, you can contact Woods Law KC to schedule a free initial consultation.
